MediaStreamTrack.id

The read-only property MediaStreamTrack.id returns a DOMString containing a unique identifier (GUID) for the track; it is generated by the browser.

Syntax

 var id = track.id;

Example

Specifications

Specification Status Comment
Media Capture and Streams
The definition of 'MediaStreamTrack.id' in that specification.		 Candidate Recommendation Initial specification.
